short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows the user to block content on popular social media, and make a blocklist for websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Optimize your workflow by avoiding the rabbit-hole of social media during studying. Increase your productivity and get more work done.

This app has a "distraction-free mode" available for Instagram, Youtube, Facebook, Reddit, Twitter. It allows you to be able to look at messages without having to get caught in the trap of scrolling endlessly through posts.

The app also features a "blocklist" that prevents you from visiting some sites while studying.

App Icon Made by catkuro from flaticon.com: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/work-station_3028171?related_item_id=3028171&term=work
